price: Dhugumatti, dhaloota isin duraa irraa, yeroo isaan lubbuu isaanii miidhanii, ergamtoonni isaanii raajii dirree taa’uun isaanitti dhufanii hin amanin balleessinee jirraAkka kanatti ummata badii raawwattoota ta’aniif galata galchina.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā al-qurūna min qablikum lammā ẓalamū wajāathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti wamā kānū liyu'minū kadhālika najzī al-qawma al-muj'rimīna
